name: Tidal Connection
uniques: [+2 Production, +2 Food, +2 Gold, +1 Faith] from every [Coast]
[+2 Production, +2 Food, +2 Gold, +1 Faith] from every [Ocean]
+[50]% Strength for units fighting in [Water] tiles

name: The Frozen Mother
uniques: +[50]% Strength for units fighting in [Snow] tiles
+[50]% Strength for units fighting in [Tundra] tiles

name: Scorching Saint
uniques: [+7 Production, +7 Faith, +7 Science, +7 Gold] from every [Krakatoa]
[+7 Production, +7 Faith, +7 Science, +7 Culture] from every [Mount Fuji]
+[50]% Strength for units fighting in [Desert] tiles

name: God-King
uniques: [+5 Faith, +2 Gold, +2 Food, +2 Production, +2 Happiness, +2 Culture, +2 Science] <in cities with a [Palace]> <before the [Modern era]>
[+10 Faith, +5 Gold, +5 Food, +5 Production, +5 Happiness, +5 Culture, +5 Science] <in cities with a [Palace]> <starting from the [Modern era]>
[+5 Faith, +5 Gold, +5 Food, +5 Production, +5 Happiness, +5 Culture, +5 Science] [in other cities] <starting from the [Modern era]>
